title: Using a computer catalogue
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Jenny Craig, Keith Rees, Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: Because of changing library information systems, computerised catalogues are increasingly being used to record, store and retrieve holdings in libraries. Ann Hannan demostrates how to use the OPAC (On Line Public Access Catalogue) System, which is a touch system used in public libraries.
